findLocTitle: There's no bad weather only bad clothes
findLocSubtitle: See the weather around the world and save your favourite locations.
defaultSubtitle: use the search bar to find and the add the location you need.
addLocSubtitle: Let us determine your location so you don`t waste time looking for it by yourself.
aboutDesc1: Be aware of all the weather conditions and their changes, wherever you are! Get real-time information about temperature, humidity, barometric pressure and other factors that affect the weather, and make plans with the confidence that the wrong weather won't ruin them.
aboutDesc2: Our application is easy to use, with an intuitive interface and easy access to various features, such as listing your favourite locations, choosing units of measurement, themes, 5-day and monthly forecasts.
aboutDesc3: We always welcome feedback and are ready to improve our application in the future, so we look forward to your feedback!
clearListWarning: Are you sure you want to delete all the locations you added?
resetSettingsWarning: Are you sure you want to reset all app settings?
